page.title: 14A CARPENTER'S DAY
page.content: Every morning, except Sundays, my dad goes to work at about 7.30 am to Bletchley to his boss to see where he's got to work that day. There's a job at Stacey Bushes to set a pane of glass in.When the builders put the glass in the frame,there was splinters of glass in the putty.So when they put the glass in the putty it wasn't put in properly and three days later when the people were moving in, the glass fell out.So Dad went to Stacey Bushes to work on the frame.When Dad got to the house he found the frame and he got out his chisel and hammer to get out the putty out from the frame.When Dad had got rid of putty he put a new pane of glass in,put the putty on the frame, and left it to dry.At five Dad came home from work.
